EmailTemplate.name: CRADA Approved OCC
EmailTemplate.subject: CRADA Approved OCC
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Attached is a draft CRADA with {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Partner__c} for a project entitled {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Title__c} for legal review. Please feel free to contact {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Officer__c} for additional details.
Thank you.
